jobDescription: Internship for school, mostly small tasks like fixing bugs, doing documentation and learning C#.

Involved mainly in the maintenance of a large scale application using the Microsoft stack (MS-SQL, .NET MVC) and AngularJS. Designed and created a rest api and a mobile version of the application with Ionic Framework. During my stay I also did many smaller side-projects targeted towards mobile.
Leading the mobile development side of an application.
Maintaining and developing the finnish news service Iltalehti.
